item.title: Hotfix 6.3.4
item.description:
Hey folks,

We've just rolled out Hotfix 6.3.4 for Total War: WARHAMMER III. This time round, we focused on four key areas of improvement; fixes for idle AI, Chaos Dwarfs not recruiting enough high-tier units, Golgfag Maneater idle issues, and improvements to how the Ogre Kingdoms AI uses Camps. Additional fixes across battle and campaign are also being implemented in this hotfix, and you can read the full list of everything included in the release notes linked below.

üëâ READ THE FULL HOTFIX 6.3.4 NOTES HERE üëà

Our teams will now switch their focus to readying 7.0 for it's release on December 4th, alongside the release of Tides of Torment. We have reserved ample patching time to follow up on any issues we want to address following 7.0's release and before we break for the Holidays, but Campaign AI will return as a focus for us in the new year. Whilst we've been able to address many of the impactful issues highlighted in recent months, there's more that we want to do, and we'll be looking to return to this topic as soon as we're able.

We‚Äôll share more details on what‚Äôs coming up after this when we can, and in the meantime, thank you for your patience while we work on maintaining and improving WH3.

Until then, see you on the battlefield!

‚Äî Steve // Senior Community Manager

‚ö† IMPORTANT

If you experience any issues after downloading the update, please take a moment to Verify the integrity of the game files first to ensure there were no issues when downloading. A step-by-step guide can be found in this article.

If the issues persist, please visit our support site for additional troubleshooting steps and assistance.

üß± MOD WARNING

Please note that user-generated mods may have compatibility issues with new game updates. If you are encountering performance or stability issues following a release, is recommended that you disable any mods you're running. If you continue to experience issues, please visit our support site for additional troubleshooting steps and assistance.

item.title: Crash Hotfix
item.description:
We noticed a nasty crash slipped through the cracks, so that's been fixed now ÀêsteamthumbsupÀê

Other notes:

  • We're also aware that there's issues with a couple vehicle kits going invisible due to the new code around proximity fading when the camera is close to it. We're looking into why this is happening. In the meantime if you could please use a different kit temporarily, would be great.

  • Steam Deck still has pretty bad performance issues that we're looking into. They seemingly popped up in one of the summertime patches, so we're narrowing down which change could have caused it. Apologies for the issue, we're on top of it though

  • We are also looking into server host performance, as hosting a full server can be pretty heavy on a player's PC. Hopefully improving performance here will help with any server desync issues as well

We're working on fixing other things as well, plus finishing up the Creation Mode LEVEL EDITOR + Workshop for release later this month.

Stay tuned for more news on that
